name: BARFFET
description:
Barf Simulator 2018

OH NO!! Your house guests ate too much, and now you need to clean up. Use your bulldozer to push the food into the garbage holes.

Made for Food Jam over a weekend in August 2018. Please note that this game is totally broken and almost nothing works. And there's no sound. And no way to win. Assets came from Google Poly. Attribution is in the Credits menu in-game.

CONTROLS

I sort of forget. Use an XBox controller for optimal results.  Jump with Y and dash with A. Right stick "moves" the camera.
